author: Gold Coast Bulletin
title: Ground News - ‘An Absolutely Beautiful Night:’ Maryland Gets Showered in Snow
text: ‘An Absolutely Beautiful Night:’ Maryland Gets Showered in Snow [winter storm](https://ground.news/interest/winter-storm)hit the Baltimore-Washington area, bringing snow on Monday, January 15. The National Weather Service said the “total snow accumulations will reach four to six inches.” Footage shared by X user @keatondesue shows the ongoing snowfall in the city of Bethesda, near Washington, citing an “absolutely beautiful night.” The winter storm warning remains in effect until Tuesday morning. Credit: @keatondesue via Storyful 2 Articles 2 Articles [Gold Coast Bulletin 24 minutes ago·Southport, AustraliaRead Full Article] ‘An Absolutely Beautiful Night:’ Maryland Gets Showered in Snow A winter storm hit the Baltimore-Washington area, bringing snow on Monday, January 15.
